== TOOLS ==

=== Phone Manager ===

[http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/phone_manager_0.0.0.7z Phone Manager] is a tool to determine if a cell phone is compatible with mesh4x sms lib.

Uploaded: 2009-02-05


=== SMS Exchange ===

[http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/smsExchanger-0.0.2.zip SMS Exchanger] is a tool to send and receive SMS from a cell phone plugged in to the PC based on file sharing.

Uploaded: 2009-02-05
